text: <@U22VBL87M> are you saying we can use package.json within themes or in severless?
We create a package.json in a directory that contains the theme’s directory.
For context the advantage of doing it on the outside is the ease of having a `src` and `dist` directory for the authoring vs deployed theme.
Our react and Vue boilerplate are set up in a not so dissimilar way so you can draw good inspiration from that. <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-vue-boilerplate>
